properties.areaDesc: Greene, GA; Oconee, GA; Clarke, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 3:25AM EST until February 14 at 3:34PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Oconee River near Penfield affecting Clarke...Greene and Oconee
Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Washington and Wilkinson
Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

Oconee River near Dublin affecting Johnson...Laurens...Washington
and Wilkinson Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Oconee River near Penfield.
* From Wednesday early afternoon until Friday afternoon.
* At 3 AM Monday the stage was 12.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 13 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Wednesday early afternoon and
continue to rise to near 15.4 feet by Thursday evening.The river
will fall below flood stage by late Friday morning.
* At 15 feet...Minor flooding continues to expand into fields...
woodlands and pastures...mainly on the right bank of the river...
upstream and downstream from the gage on the Georgia Highway 15
bridge.
